name: NETXP LINUX Register Injection Detected
description: Monitors code injection through the ptrace facility, providing visibility into potential security threats. This rule includes events indicating register injection. Detection of such activities is crucial for identifying attempts to manipulate or compromise running processes using the ptrace system call.
author: Szymon Gluch
query:
//any where auditd.log.key: "register_injection" and 
any where event.module: "auditd"
